name: AGBSmart
0:
”Alexa, lock the door”
”Alexa, unlock the door”
”Alexa, the door is locked?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill enables you to interact with your AGB - Alban Giacomo s.p.a. smart lock using Alexa and voice commands.

To get started, first tap the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa app. It will appear in the "Skills" section. Connect your AGB Okey account to discover your devices.

To use the skill, you must first set names for all your AGB devices. You can use the names previously set in the AGB Okey app or specify new ones in the Alexa app.

To discover your devices, you can say:

"Alexa, discover my devices."
Once you know the device name (for example, "front door"), you can say the following:

"Alexa, lock the front door"
"Alexa, unlock the front door"
"Alexa, is the front door locked?
